code: import{deleteRoom as _deleteRoom,editChannel}from'../../../../serverApi/serverApi';export var roomOperation=function roomOperation(roomManager,alerts){return{createChannel:function createChannel(channelName){var newRoom=roomManager.createChannel(channelName);editChannel(newRoom).then(function(room){console.log("sucessful");}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);alerts.showAlert(ErrorAlert({message:Locales.Errors.FailedCreateRoom,alertManager:alerts}));});},renameChannel:function renameChannel(newNameChannel,renameChannelId){var updateRoom=roomManager.renameChannel(newNameChannel,renameChannelId);editChannel(updateRoom).then(function(room){}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);alerts.showAlert(ErrorAlert({message:Locales.Errors.FailedCreateRoom,alertManager:alerts}));});},deleteChannel:function deleteChannel(delChannenlId){var updateRoom=roomManager.deleteChannel(delChannenlId);editChannel(updateRoom).then(function(room){redrawRoom();}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);alerts.showAlert(ErrorAlert({message:Locales.Errors.FailedCreateRoom,alertManager:alerts}));});},refreshChannel:function refreshChannel(channelId){var updateRoom=roomManager.refreshChannel(channelId);editChannel(updateRoom).then(function(room){redrawRoom();}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);alerts.showAlert(ErrorAlert({message:Locales.Errors.FailedCreateRoom,alertManager:alerts}));});},deleteRoom:function deleteRoom(roomId,returnBack){_deleteRoom(roomId).then(function(response){returnBack();}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);alerts.showAlert(ErrorAlert({message:Locales.Errors.FailedCreateRoom,alertManager:alerts}));});}};};
